title: Conditions under which uses and occupancies will be permitted in Residential, Commercial & Industria
clause_text: Conditions under which uses and occupancies will be permitted in Residential, Commercial & Industrial Zones Service Industrial users and conditions governing such uses: Note 1 i) Service industrial uses amended from time to time by government shall be allowed.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Conditions under which uses and occupancies will be permitted in Residential, Commercial & Industrial Zones
